biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

John Luessenhop is the director of Takers, starring Matt Dillon, Paul Walker, Idris Elba, Jay Hernandez, Michael Ealy, T.I., Chris Brown, and Hayden Christensen.

Also directed Lockdown

Wrote "TICK...TICK...TICK..." which premiered at the Sundance Film Festival and won best short subject film at the Florida Film Festival and is currently held by Universal Studios
